Control (DRCC), [drcc] Pre-Collision System (PCS), [pre_collision] Vehicle Dynamics Integrated Management (VDIM), [vdim] and Hill Start Assist Control (HAC) [hac_4runner] 1001056.1000851.1000862.1000883.description=Advanced Technology Package - includes Premium HDD Navigation [nav_system_xm] with Entune® App Suite [entune] App Suite and JBL®, Safety Connect® [safety_connect_1year], Dynamic Radar Cruise Control (DRCC) [drcc], Pre-Collision System (PCS) [pre_collision], Advanced Parking Guidance System (APGS) [ipa] and Panoramic View Moonroof with power sliding sunshades 1001056.1002622.1000857.1000959.videokey= 1001056.1002622.1000854.1000907.package=true 1001056.1002622.1000862.1000883.description=Entune™ Premium JBL® Audio with Navigation [nav_system_xm] and App Suite [entune] — includes the Entune™ Multimedia Bundle [entune_tm] (6.1-in. high-resolution touch-screen with split-screen display, AM/FM CD player with MP3/WMA playback capability, eight JBL® GreenEdge™ speakers, auxiliary audio jack, USB 2.0 port [usb] with iPod® [ipod] connectivity and control, advanced voice recognition, [adv_voice_recognition] hands-free phone capability, phone book access and music streaming [bluetooth_streaming] via Bluetooth® [bluetooth] wireless technology), Entune® App Suite, [entune] HD Radio™, [hd_radio] HD predictive traffic and Doppler weather overlay, AM/FM cache radio, SiriusXM All Access Radio [siriusxm] with 3-month complimentary trial, Gracenote® album cover art, and integrated backup camera [camera] display

Entune® App Suite [entune] — includes Bing™, Facebook Places, iHeartRadio, MovieTickets.com, OpenTable®, Pandora® [pandora] and Yelp®; real-time info including traffic, weather, fuel prices, sports and stocks. Access to Entune® App Suite [entune] services is subscription-free. See toyota.com/entune for details.

Dynamic Radar Cruise Control (DRCC) [drcc], Pre-Collision System (PCS) [pre_collision], Lane Departure Alert (LDA) [ldw], Auto High Beam (AHB) [auto_highbeam], Panoramic View Moonroof with power sliding sunshades, Safety Connect® [safety_connect_1year] — includes Emergency Assistance, Stolen Vehicle Locator, Roadside Assistance and Automatic Collision Notification. Available by subscription. (Complimentary one-year trial subscription.) 1001056.1000851.1000857.1000957.msrp=1400.00 1001056.1002622.1000854.1000905.package=true 1001056.1002622.1000862.1000883.derived=false 1001056.1000851.1000861.1000880.source=NVS 1001056.derived= 1001056.1000851.1000857.1000957.package=true 1001056.1000851.1000857.1000958.title=Advanced Technology Package 1001056.1002622.1000854.1000909.msrp=750 1001056.1002622.1000857.1000957.secondaryfeatures= 1001056.1002622.1000854.1000908.package=true 1001056.1002622.1000857.1000960.group= 1001056.1002622.1000857.1000955.specialexteriorcolorflag=false 1001056.1002622.1000854.1000911.package=true 1001056.1002622.1000862.1000883.alacarte=false 1001056.1002622.1000857.1000957.videokey= 1001056.1002622.1000862.1000883.source=NVS 1001056.1002622.1000857.1000959.specialexteriorcolorflag=false 1001056.1002622.1000857.1000959.source=NVS 1001056.1002622.1000857.1000960.source=NVS 1001056.1002622.1000854.1000911.derived=false 1001056.1002622.1000857.1000960.viewpointkey= 1001056.1002622.1000854.1000905.title=Advanced Technology Package 1001056.1002622.1000857.1000959.option=false 1001056.1002622.1000857.1000960.alacarte=false 1001056.1002622.1000861.1000880.option=false 1001056.1002622.1000857.1000960.package=true 1001056.1002622.1000857.1000957.group= 1001056.1000851.1000862.1000883.package=true
